Uses of Class
com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsontype.BasicPolymorphicTypeValidator.Builder

  • Packages that use BasicPolymorphicTypeValidator.Builder 
    Package Description
    com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsontype
    Package that contains interfaces that define how to implement functionality for dynamically resolving type during deserialization.

    • Uses of BasicPolymorphicTypeValidator.Builder in com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsontype
